title: Vasundhara Emerald and Ruby Haaram - A Regal Statement Necklace
features: This breathtaking Haaram showcases a meticulously crafted design. The necklace chain features alternating rows of vibrant oval-cut emeralds and scintillating Polki diamonds. The pendant showcases a cluster of uncut diamonds shaped like the sun which is placed above a large ruby that is pear-shaped, faceted and surrounded by small diamonds on a 22K gold setting. The gold work displays a delicate filigree design giving the piece an air of modern regalness.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale modern events requiring a statement piece.
description: Exudes timeless elegance with a fusion of traditional South Indian aesthetics and modern design sensibilities. The rare combination of high-quality emeralds, Polki diamonds, and a radiant ruby makes this a truly unique and valuable heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, creating a captivating visual impact. A true investment in artistry and heritage.
